title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVIII, subch. E, pt. 890 - Conservation, Development And Utilization Of Delaware River Basin Water Resources
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVIII, subch. E, pt. 890 - Conservation, Development And Utilization Of Delaware River Basin Water Resources

State Regulations

Conservation (§ 890.1 to 890.7-a)

Allocation of Water Resources (§ 890.8 to 890.12)

Surface Waters (§ 890.15 to 890.19)

Underground Waters (§ 890.25 to 890.31)

Importations and Exportations of Water (§ 890.35 to 890.43)

Regionalization (§ 890.45 to 890.46)

Water Metering (§ 890.50 to 890.52)

Flood - Damage Reduction (§ 890.55)

Watershed Management (§ 890.60 to 890.61)

Fish and Wildlife (§ 890.70)

Hydroelectric Power (§ 890.75)

Wetlands Protection (§ 890.80 to 890.83)

Design Streamflow Criteria (§ 890.85 to 890.87)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVIII, subch. E, pt. 890

Statutory authority: Delaware River Basin Compact, §
14.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
